nodes.text: Dreadnaught-One, called D-One for short, was the first of six Dreadnaught-class heavy cruisers used on Outbound Flight.
It came directly off of the Rendili StarDrive line for use on the project in 27 BBY. It was the command ship of the Outbound Flight and Captain Pakmillu's flagship.

The ComOps Center or Combined Operations Center for Outbound Flight could be found aboard Dreadnaught-One. From this area, Captain Pakmillu had control over all six Dreadnaughts. Located just behind the bridge/monitor room complex, the ComOps Center stretched for thirty meters between the two main bow corridors.
Jorus C'baoth's quarters were on Deck Three, Suite A-Four, with Lorana Jinzler's nearby. Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker's quarters were on Deck Five, Suite A-Eight.

After Outbound Flight crashed, this Dreadnaught was the one that took the brunt of the impact while crash landing. It would remain untouched for fifty years until Luke Skywalker and Mara Jade Skywalker go into it and discover the dead bodies of Lorana Jinzler, a Chiss and Lorana's lightsaber.
